last_episode_to_air.name: Gran Finale
last_episode_to_air.overview:
The final five queens face a challenging lip-sync that turns into singing, showcasing their full potential to win their place in

the Queen Stars Trio in a season finale loaded with glitter and glamour.

name: Queen Stars Brazil
overview: Pabllo Vittar and Luísa Sonza lead the fight for the crown of pop music in a competition where lip-sync queens unleash their own voices to win a place in Brazil's most talented drag queen musical trio.

episodes.name: Auditions - Drag Anthems
episodes.overview:
The twenty best artists from the Brazilian drag queen scene try to enter the competition for the pop crown, but only fifteen

divas will make it to the next stage.

episodes.name: Triple Alliances
episodes.overview: The fifteen queens perform in trios, meet the coaches who will take them to the top 10 and have a taste of how the competition can change their lives. A dream trio show reveals what will be expected from the queens on stage.

episodes.name: Which Drag Am I?
episodes.overview: The ten remaining queens have to show off their inner divas. At the training center, they learn evolution has no limits, and after the presentations, a new element of the competition is revealed: Queenscandal is coming!

episodes.name: Being a Diva
episodes.overview: You will only stay in the game by being a diva! The queens empower their inner divas at the training center while dealing with the pressure of competition and Queenscandal's "gift," which can be a thorn in everyone's side.

episodes.name: Speeding Up the Beat
episodes.overview: Our queens must sweat their wigs off to give flawless performances with speeded-up hits. That is if they can survive the restrictions imposed by Queenscandal's power.

episodes.name: Tearing Hearts
episodes.overview: With performances full of passion and romantic songs, the queens are out to tearing hearts. For this episode, Queenscandal has immunity and can't be eliminated by the other contestants.

episodes.name: Divos
episodes.overview: The semifinal connects the queens with their masculine side as they perform hits made popular by music divos' interpretations. Pabllo helps the queens find the connection they need to guarantee a place in the final.

episodes.name: Gran Finale
episodes.overview:
The final five queens face a challenging lip-sync that turns into singing, showcasing their full potential to win their place in

the Queen Stars Trio in a season finale loaded with glitter and glamour.
